# Run Model

```{r}
#example model code


# run the model
almondyield(area = 0.1, data = clim, 
        clr = "green", eunit = "W", g=FALSE)

# run and save results - but don't plot
site1 <- solarpv(area = 0.1, solar = sierraczosolar, 
            clr = "green", eunit = "W", g = FALSE)
site1$mean
site1$annual

```
